name: Pete and the Beanstalk
description:
Overview

Pete the Penguin is on another adventure yet again! After seeing Jack grow a beanstalk, our loveable penguin does the same and plants his own seed. Test your reflexes and help Pete run as far as possible up the beanstalk, while collecting as many flowers as he can.

Controls

A/Left Arrow to teleport left.

D/Right Arrow to teleport right.

ESC to quit game
